duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the cafe's daily operations and set the tone for the location
Build genuine connections with guests and establish regulars in the cafe
Enforce quality assurance and steps of service, ensuring overall profitability of the store
Encourage development amongst the team through conversations and reviews with teammates
Lead by example and set the bar for Health & Safety and ServSafe compliance for the store
Play an active role in the community through engagement and fulfilment of the value proposition in the neighborhood

education_certification.credential: 2+ years experience as a General Manager in a full-service restaurant
